name: Hoyo de Tradicion Toro Grande
additionalNotes: A new line of super-premium, high quality cigar by HOYO DE MONTEREY. The wrapper, an original genetic engineering innovation, is a Viso Rosado leaf from the Jamestran Valley in Honduras, has been combined with a Habano-Connecticut binder and a blend of Dominican and sweet Nicaraguan fillers to create a medium body.
